latestnews.title: Goldman says to buy these 8 stocks ahead of a semiconductor boom
latestnews.Content: Goldman Sachs has named a number of stocks set to benefit as the world’s biggest chipmakers spend billions of dollars trying to address the global semiconductor shortage.

latestnews.title: Climate scientists swap fieldwork for finance
latestnews.Content: Environmental scientist Laura Garcia Velez cut her teeth on projects to help Ethiopian farmers insure crops for drought and connect remote Colombian communities.

latestnews.title: Apple won’t make an iPhone Mini next year, says top analyst
latestnews.Content: Apple’s 2022 iPhones could come in four different models with significantly improved cameras, TFI analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said in a Wednesday note to investors.
